name: Little farm (itch) (Kotikov D)
description:
Little farm game simulator. This project on GitHub: https://github.com/KotikovD/LittleFarmGame

Controls:

  • Move camera - drag screen
  • Move inventory - drag left-right in inventory zone
  • Collect resource - click on farm when it ready
  • For buy new cells - click on it

Autors:

  • Anna Kotikova - 2D-artist - behance.net
  • Dmitry Kotikov - Unity3D Developer - kotikov.pro
